summary: A speculation on the fate of the famous hijacker who parachuted with his ransom and disappeared in the mountains, has Cooper following a meticulous plan to disappear into anonymity despite the best efforts of a dogged cop.
cast: Robert Duvall|Treat Williams|Kathryn Harrold|Ed Flanders|Paul Gleason|R.G. Armstrong|Dorothy Fielding|Nicolas Coster|Cooper Huckabee|Howard K. title: Un millón de dólares en el aire
